K10D0331_H0335:396b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0331_H0335:396b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0331_H0335:396b-6: bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa can na 'gro ba po'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na bzhugs te /
K10D0331_H0335:397a-0: de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang @397a *//
K10D0331_H0335:397a-1: po sgra gcan gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'od kyis bkab par gyur to //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-2: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha
K10D0331_H0335:397a-3: gang yin pa de skrag cing dngangs la mi dga'
K10D0331_H0335:397a-4: bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
K10D0331_H0335:397a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10D0331_H0335:397a-7: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10D0331_H0335:397a-8: kun las rnam par rab grol ba'i //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-9: sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-10: gnod pa dag dang phrad gyur pa //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-11: bdag gi skyabs ni mdzad par gsol //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-12: 'jig rten dgra bcom bde gshegs la //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-13: zla ba skyabs su mchi lags kyi //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-14: sangs rgyas 'jig rten thugs brtse rnams //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-15: zla ba thar mdzod sgra gcan las //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-17: sgra gcan zla ba mun sel ba //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-18: nam mkha' dag la 'od byed cing //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-19: lam mer 'dug la dkar ba dang //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-20: rnam par dag pa'i 'od ldan pa //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-21: bar snang dag la ma bzang bar //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-22: skye dgu'i sgron de myur du thong //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-23: de nas rings bzhin sgra gcan de //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-24: lus kyang rdul cing skrag gyur la //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-25: nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-26: zla ba rnam par gtong bar byed //
K10D0331_H0335:397a-27: de nas rnam par snang byed kyi'u chen pos lha
K10D0331_H0335:397a-28: ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan rings pa bas
K10D0331_H0335:397b-0: kyang rings par zla @397b ba'i dkyil 'khor gtong ba
K10D0331_H0335:397b-1: mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa //
K10D0331_H0335:397b-2: ci yi phyir na sgra gcan khyod //
K10D0331_H0335:397b-3: lus kyang rdul cing skrag gyur la //
K10D0331_H0335:397b-4: nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis; ;rings par zla ba gtong bar byed /
K10D0331_H0335:397b-6: sangs rgyas tshigs bcad 'di brjod pas //
K10D0331_H0335:397b-7: gal te zla ba ma btang na //
K10D0331_H0335:397b-8: bdag gi mgo bo tshal bdun 'gas //
K10D0331_H0335:397b-9: gson yang bde bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0331_H0335:397b-10: rnam par snang byed kyi bu chen pos smras pa /
K10D0331_H0335:397b-11: kye ma bden pa gzigs pa yi //
K10D0331_H0335:397b-12: sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba rmad //
K10D0331_H0335:397b-13: de dag gis ni tshigs su bcad //
K10D0331_H0335:397b-14: brjod na sgra gcan zla ba gtong //
